name: Pixel Image File
summary: Learn about .PX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Pixel image files can be saved in RGB, CMYK, grayscale, and CIE Lab modes, as well as the HDR (High Dynamic Range) format with 32-bit precision.
The Pixel image editor was previously known as Pixel32.

description: Image file saved by the Pixel image editor, a multi-platform image editing, photo retouching, graphics manipulation, and animation program; supports layers, paths, channels, masks, and selections; may also include adjustment and effects layer like a Photoshop (.PSD) document.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .px file in Statistics Sweden PxWin
images.caption: PX file open in Statistics Sweden PxWin
